instruction: Rewrite the following paragraph in the form of a list of 4 points.
input: Charlotte is a great friend. She is always there to lend a helping hand, listens to whatever you have to say, and offers good advice. She also loves to hang out and have a good time.
output:
- Always there to lend a helping hand
- Listens to whatever you have to say
- Offers good advice
- Loves to hang out and have a good time
